title: Fort Pulaski National Monument: Planning
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved     Planning            Planning           Final General Management Plan, Wilderness Study, and Environmental Impact Statement NPS/FOPU  Final General Management Plan, Wilderness Study, and Environmental Impact Statement (Adobe PDF 8.69 MB) In June of 2013, after several years of development and planning, the National Park Service and Fort Pulaski National Monument released the Final General Management Plan, Wilderness Study, and Environmental Impact Statement. The development of a general management plan for Fort Pulaski lays the foundation for the long term direction of the national monument. It provides a vision for the future of a park and a practical framework for decision making and represents the broadest level of planning conducted by the National Park Service.   Â   Documents Open for Public Review  Loading ...  There are currently no projects with documents open for public review for Fort Pulaski National Monument.    Other Plans and Projects An archive of completed projects as well as projects without documents open for comment may be found on the PEPC website.
